posts.post_title: A few T206 cards graded "For Sale"...
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Iggy...
I have a few T206 PSA graded commons for sale .  These are mostly real nice on the front, with either staining or specks of paper loss on the back lowering the grade.  Paypal, check, or money order will work, add $2 for shipping.  My email address is agonzdude@yahoo.com.  

T206 Clark PSA 2
T206 Donovan PSA 2
T206 Hall PSA 2
T206 Mitchell PSA 5
T206 Moeller PSA 2
T206 Schreck PSA 2
T206 Warhop PSA 2
T206 Unglaub PSA 2
T206 Unglaub PSA 3
T206 Unglaub PSA 4
T206 Wagnar PSA 1

Follow this link to view my prices and pictures:  [url]http://jaguar.ir.miami.edu/~iggy/BB_card3/index.html[/url]

-Lovely Day, Iggy...
